name: #Diable Avionics Station Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the "Diable Avionics Corporation" Space Station.

name: Corvid Engineering Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the ship hulls, fighter LPCs and Weapons from Corvid Engineering.

name: Corvid Engineering Dev Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the ship hulls, fighter LPCs and Weapons from Corvid Engineering “DEV ITEM”.

name: Rebuilt Nanoforge
desc:
A powerful and versatile manufacturing "black box", capable of building itself out to an industrial scale given the necessary raw materials and human assistance. This Nanoforge was refit using what’s left of Diable Avionics' technologA powerful and versatile manufacturing "black box", capable of building itself out to an industrial scale given the necessary raw materials and human assistance. 

This Nanoforge was refit using the Leftovers of Diable Avionics' 3 bases, the aid of a Gamma Core and a lot of luck. The Nanoforge has been partially rebuilt with a fraction of its prime capabilities, sacrificing production speed to prioritize quality control.
